page.title: 04LAW AND ORDER IN THORNTON
page.content: { P.C 2687 WINKLEY} HAS BEEN WORKING AT THORNTON POLICE STATION FOR 3 YEARS.HE HAS TWO DAYS OFF A WEEK ,AND HE WORKS ALONE.P.C WINKLEY USED TO BE A FARMER AND USED TO OWN A FARM. IN THE POLICE FORCE IF THEY CATCH VANDALS USUALLY THEY GO AND SORT THINGS OUT WITH THEIR PARENTS AND GET A CAUTION.IN SOME CASES THEY GO TO COURT AND SOMETIMES THEY ARE SENT TO A DISCIPLINARY SCHOOL.P .C WINKLEY IS A LOCAL POLICEMAN AND HE RIDES ABOUT ON A BIKE.HE RIDES ABOUT ON A BICYCLE FOR THE SIMPLE REASON HE CAN GET TO KNOW PEOPLE ALOT BETTER.IN THE POLICE FORCE TODAY IT MADE UP OF MODERN TECHNOLOGY. THERE IS A WHOLE NETWORK OF COMPUTERS LINKED UP TO A MAIN COMPUTER IN SWANSEA. BY{ MICHAEL DUNKOW}
